Constraint ConstraintO2

Constraint ConstraintNO2

Detailed Description

Constrain Mass Octupole center of mass corrected by substraction of Xcm expectation value

(c) 2003 Thomas Neff

Definition in file ConstraintOctupole.h.

const SlaterDetAux *  X,
double *  o2 
)

Definition at line 492 of file ConstraintOctupole.c.

References calcCMPosition(), calcSlaterDetOBME(), dim, par, and SQR.

Referenced by main().

{
  double Xcm[3];
  double o[27], osq = 0.0;
  int i;

  calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);

  OneBodyOperator op_ob_o = {dim: 27, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_eoctupole};

  calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_o, o);

  for (i=0; i<27; i++)
    osq += SQR(o[i]);

  *o2 = sqrt(osq);
}

void calcgradConstraintEO2 ( const SlaterDet *  Q,
const SlaterDetAux *  X,
const gradSlaterDetAux *  dX,
gradSlaterDet *  do2 
)

Definition at line 566 of file ConstraintOctupole.c.

References calcCMPosition(), calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(), calcgradSlaterDetOBME(), calcSlaterDetOBME(), dim, octupolepara::o, par, SQR, gradSlaterDet::val, and octupolepara::Xcm.

{
  double Xcm[3];
  double o[27], osq = 0.0;
  int i;
  octupolepara o2para;

  calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);

  OneBodyOperator op_ob_o = {dim: 27, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_eoctupole};

  calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_o, o);

  for (i=0; i<27; i++)
    osq += SQR(o[i]);
  
  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
    o2para.Xcm[i] = Xcm[i];

  for (i=0; i<27; i++)
    o2para.o[i] = o[i]/sqrt(osq);

  gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_o2 = {opt: 1, par: &o2para, me: gob_eoctupole};

  calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_o2, do2);

  OneBodyOperator gcmop_ob_o2 = {dim: 6, opt: 1, par: &o2para, me: gcmob_octupole};

  calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gcmop_ob_o2, do2);
  do2->val = sqrt(osq);
}

void calcgradConstraintNO2 ( const SlaterDet *  Q,
const SlaterDetAux *  X,
const gradSlaterDetAux *  dX,
gradSlaterDet *  do2 
)

Definition at line 600 of file ConstraintOctupole.c.

References calcCMPosition(), calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(), calcgradSlaterDetOBME(), calcSlaterDetOBME(), dim, octupolepara::o, par, SQR, gradSlaterDet::val, and octupolepara::Xcm.

{
  double Xcm[3];
  double o[27], osq = 0.0;
  int i;
  octupolepara o2para;

  calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);

  OneBodyOperator op_ob_o = {dim: 27, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_noctupole};

  calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_o, o);

  for (i=0; i<27; i++)
    osq += SQR(o[i]);
  
  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
    o2para.Xcm[i] = Xcm[i];

  for (i=0; i<27; i++)
    o2para.o[i] = o[i]/sqrt(osq);

  gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_o2 = {opt: 1, par: &o2para, me: gob_noctupole};

  calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_o2, do2);

  OneBodyOperator gcmop_ob_o2 = {dim: 6, opt: 1, par: &o2para, me: gcmob_octupole};

  calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gcmop_ob_o2, do2);
  do2->val = sqrt(osq);
}

void calcgradConstraintO2 ( const SlaterDet *  Q,
const SlaterDetAux *  X,
const gradSlaterDetAux *  dX,
gradSlaterDet *  do2 
)

Definition at line 532 of file ConstraintOctupole.c.

References calcCMPosition(), calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(), calcgradSlaterDetOBME(), calcSlaterDetOBME(), dim, octupolepara::o, par, SQR, gradSlaterDet::val, and octupolepara::Xcm.

{
  double Xcm[3];
  double o[27], osq = 0.0;
  int i;
  octupolepara o2para;

  calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);

  OneBodyOperator op_ob_o = {dim: 27, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_octupole};

  calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_o, o);

  for (i=0; i<27; i++)
    osq += SQR(o[i]);
  
  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
    o2para.Xcm[i] = Xcm[i];

  for (i=0; i<27; i++)
    o2para.o[i] = o[i]/sqrt(osq);

  gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_o2 = {opt: 1, par: &o2para, me: gob_octupole};

  calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_o2, do2);

  OneBodyOperator gcmop_ob_o2 = {dim: 6, opt: 1, par: &o2para, me: gcmob_octupole};

  calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gcmop_ob_o2, do2);
  do2->val = sqrt(osq);
}
